body:
@ThePiachu append allocates a new array and copies if necessary, so that's why the assignment is needed. If there is adequate space in the underlying array (as in your case), it reuses that space.

If you want to continue the discussion, you should head over to golang-nuts or another forum (see https://github.com/golang/go/wiki/Questions). There are also some previous threads about append which may be helpful.
